short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline Salesforce - Edit scripts, fetch data, and execute commands seamlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce ProTools: Elevate Your Salesforce Workflow

Improve your productivity on Salesforce with Salesforce ProTools. From lightning-fast data fetching to seamless script execution, my extension is designed to help your workflow.

KEY FEATURES:

-Quick Copy: Instantly fetch record data, generate an Apex script for insertion, and copy it to your clipboard. Streamline your workflow by eliminating manual script creation.

-Fetch and Edit: Retrieve record data, generate an editable Apex script, and open it in a code editor for customization. Execute your modified script on the server and view debug outputâ€”all without leaving your record page.

-Execute Anonymous: Open a blank code editor for executing anonymous Apex scripts on the server. Execute commands and view debug output in real-time without leaving the page!

-Color Picker: Customize the appearance of the extension widget with the built-in color picker.

-Light and Dark Themes: Personalize your workspace with the option to switch between light and dark themes. Enhance readability and reduce eye strain by toggling between these two distinct modes.
